item.title: Chain broken on swing, 12th February
item.description:
I put my 12month old in the swing not noticing the broken chain and she flung forward nearly falling out onto her face. It was very scary. Lucky I caught her. Someone else might not be so lucky. The chain is broken on one side - see picture.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meeson Street, Hackney, London

item.title: The entrance to my property is filled with litter, rubbish bin bags left there for months, rats the size of a cat., 12th February
item.description:
Urgent Environmental Health Concern â€“ Waste, Vermin, and Public Nuisance Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to formally report a serious environmental health concern regarding waste accumulation in the rear garden area adjacent to my residence. For several months, the Bromley Picturehouse team has been storing and leaving the following items in the back garden area: â€¢ Commercial rubbish bins â€¢ Wooden pallets â€¢ Metal materials â€¢ Building site signage â€¢ Furniture (chairs and other items) â€¢ General waste and bin bags While I have observed team members removing some items, a substantial amount of waste and materials remains abandoned. The situation has now resulted in: â€¢ A significant rat infestation (large rodents frequently visible) â€¢ Persistent foul odours â€¢ Obstructed access due to scattered pallets and debris â€¢ A highly distressing and unsanitary view from my property This is not only unpleasant but constitutes a public health concern. I have photographic/video evidence of both the waste accumulation and staff activity in the area, which I am prepared to provide upon request. I respectfully request that this matter be investigated urgently and that the area be cleared and properly managed to prevent further vermin infestation and environmental nuisance. I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and look forward to your response. Kind regards, Andreea Duta

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marina Close, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, 12th February
item.description:

item.title: Tree growing fungus, 12th February
item.description:
